get.description:
Includes the fields productGames, firstDrawDate, lastDrawDate when present.
Results can be optionally filtered by providing gameId and status for the desired subscriptions. 
 * To simulate exception 42 (Invalid filters) provide subscriptionName without playerId or cancelCode without  playerId or  any of the fromDate, toDate

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The GUID

parameters.name: subsRecId
parameters.description: The id of the the subscription

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The id of the player that owns the subscription

parameters.name: subscriptionName
parameters.description: The id of the player that owns the subscription

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: The id of the the game

parameters.name: productBundleId
parameters.description: The id of a product bundle

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the subscription

parameters.name: cancelCode
parameters.description: The cancel code for cancelled subscriptions

parameters.name: platformType
parameters.description: The platformTypeName of the subscription

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The earliest value for the subscriptions Creation Date MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The latest value for the subscriptions Creation Date MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the paged results

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size of the paged results

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The property the results will be ordered by

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Set true to get the results in descending order

post.description: The returned subscription record has a subscription record id * To simulate No Data Found exception (code=30) use productBundleId = 10 * To simulate No Data Found With Details exception (code=31) use productBundleId = 11 * To simulate Bad Request With Details exception (code=41) use productBundleId = 0 * To simulate Bad Request exception (code=40) use productBundleId = "string" * To simulate Generic Error exception (code=10) use productBundleId = 99 * To simulate Misconfigured Product Bundle (code=55) use productBundleId = 100 * CouponDTO data is defined based on the game engine. An example request including couponDTO data can be found Here

## Internal Server Error 
 * 10 - Generic internal error 
 * 52 - Product bundle with id {0} is not properly configured 
 * 54 - Player {0} has already a subscription with name: {1}

get.summary: Returns the unique subscription based on the id provided

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The GUID

parameters.name: subRecId
parameters.description: The id of the the subscription

put.summary: Cancels and returns the subscription with updated status
put.description:
In some cases other properties may be updated as well.
  * To simulate No Data Found exception (code=30) use subRecId = 1 
  * To simulate No Data Found With Details exception (code=31) use subRecId = 2 
  * To simulate No Status Change exception (code=51) use subRecId = 100 
  * To simulate Bad Request With Details exception (code=41) use cancelledBy = 0 
  * To simulate Bad Request exception (code=40) use cancelSubscriptionAdminRequest = "string" 
  * To simulate Generic Error exception (code=10) use subRecId = 99

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The GUID

parameters.name: subRecId
parameters.description: The id of the the subscription

parameters.name: cancelSubscriptionAdminRequest
parameters.description: Contains the id of the operation and the cancellation code

400.description:
## Bad Request 
 * 40 - Bad request 
 * 41 - Bad request, {0} 
 * 51 - The status {0} is already the status of the subscription

500.description:
## Internal Server Error 
 * 10 - Generic internal error

get.description:
Does not include the fields productGames, firstDrawDate,lastDrawDate. Results can be optionally filtered by providing gameId,subsRecId,productBundleId and status for the desired subscriptions 
 * To simulate exception 42 (Invalid filters) provide subscriptionName without playerId or cancelCode without  playerId or  any of the fromDate, toDate

post.description: The returned subscription record has a subscription record id * To simulate No Data Found exception (code=30) use productBundleId = 10 * To simulate No Data Found With Details exception (code=31) use productBundleId = 11 * To simulate Bad Request With Details exception (code=41) use productBundleId = 0 * To simulate Bad Request exception (code=40) use productBundleId = "string" * To simulate Generic Error exception (code=10) use productBundleId = 99 * To simulate Misconfigured Product Bundle (code=55) use productBundleId = 100 * CouponDTO data is defined based on the game engine. An example request including couponDTO data can be found Here

get.summary: Returns the unique subscription based on the id provided

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The GUID

parameters.name: subRecId
parameters.description: The id of the the subscription

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The id of the the subscription

put.summary: Cancels and returns the subscription with updated status
put.description:
In some cases other properties  may be updated as well.
  * To simulate No Data Found exception (code=30) use subRecId = 1 
  * To simulate No Data Found With Details exception (code=31) use subRecId = 2 
  * To simulate Forbiden Resource exception (code=21) use playerId = 1 and subsRecId=3 
  * To simulate No Status Change exception (code=51) use subRecId = 100 
  * To simulate Bad Request With Details exception (code=41) use playerId = 0 
  * To simulate Bad Request exception (code=40) use cancelSubscriptionAdminRequest = "string" 
  * To simulate Generic Error exception (code=10) use subRecId = 99

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The GUID

parameters.name: subRecId
parameters.description: The id of the the subscription

parameters.name: cancelSubscriptionRequest
parameters.description: Includes cancellation reason code and the player id of the owner of the subscription

400.description:
## Bad Request 
 * 40 - Bad request 
 * 41 - Bad request, {0} 
 * 51 - The status {0} is already the status of the subscription

403.description:
## Forbidden 
 * 21 - The user does not have the necessary permissions for this resource.

500.description:
## Internal Server Error 
 * 10 - Generic internal error

couponDTO.description: a wrapper for the coupon data

playerId.description: the id of the player requesting the update

productBundleId.description: the game product id for the subscription edit request

subRecId.description: the id of the subscription record to be updated

updatedBy.description: the id of the of the entity that updates the subscription. Required only in Subscription Admin interface

playerId.description: the id of the player who owns the subscriptions

couponDTO.description: a wrapper for the actual coupon data that will be wagered

createdBy.description: the id of the of the subscription creator. If it is the player then the id is the id of the player else it is the id of the operator

jackpotThreshold.description: the jackpot threshold over which the subscription will participate in the draw. Only when subscription type is jackpot

platformType.description: the source from which the request came

productBundleId.description: the product bundle id for the subscription create request

sourceIp.description: The ip of the source through which the subscription was created

subscriptionAttributes.description: A list of possible subscription attributes

subscriptionCost.description: the initial full cost of the subscription

creationDate.description: The date that the subscription was created

firstDrawDate.description: The date of the first draw the subscription participated

id.description: a unique internal id of the subscription

jackpotThreshold.description: the jackpot threshold over which the subscription will participate in the draw. Only when subscription type is jackpot

lastDrawDate.description: The date of the last draw has participated until now

nextDrawDate.description: The date of the next draw that the subscription will participated

playerId.description: The id of the player corresponding to the subscription

productBundleId.description: The id of the subscription's product bundle

status.description: An Enum with the possible Subscription statuses

subscriptionCost.description: The initial full cost of the subscription

changedBy.description: Who edited the subscription last time

firstPlayDraw.description: The draw when the subscription participated for the first time

nextPlayDraw.description: The next draw when the subscription will participate
